name: Sandra Gärtner
jobTitle: Public Health Scientist | Complementary & Integrative Medicine
description: Public health scientist with knowledge in evidence-based complementary and alternative medicine (CAM). Strong interest in social sustainability and holistic societal development, with the conviction that interdisciplinary and cross-sectoral collaboration is the key to success. Solid background and education in business management and business development with the ability to maintain an overall perspective. Reflective, analytical, and inclusive approach well suited for addressing complex societal challenges. Creative, curious, and driven with the desire to create a safe, secure, and thriving world.

hasOccupation.description: Conduct quantitative data collection and analysis within a randomized research project on digital MediYoga for atrial fibrillation. Work involves participant contact, questionnaire and health data, report support, as well as ongoing research administration.

Project administrator for the event Swedish Forum for Integrative Cancer Care V, as well as research assistant in the evaluation of educational initiatives in complementary and alternative medicine for healthcare professionals and cancer patients.

hasOccupation.name: Restorative Yoga Teacher and Reiki Master

hasOccupation.description: Explore the intersection between science and spirituality by critically examining practices such as yoga, meditation, breathing, and energy medicine with an evidence-based approach. Previously guided hundreds of individuals through courses, individual sessions, retreats, and group work. Today, offer the concept 'Rest in Reiki', a calming program focused on stillness and recovery, combining restorative yoga, meditation, reiki, and soothing breathing exercises.

Supported the development of the support process for Integrative Cancer Care and initiated the evaluation of educational initiatives in complementary and alternative medicine for healthcare professionals and cancer patients.

Development of the popular health podcast focused on holistic health together with the founder. Main focus was strategy work and research with many points of contact, and occasionally interviewing guests.
